capabilities.name: get_llm_txt
capabilities.description: Fetch an LLM.txt file from a given URL. Format your response in beautiful markdown.

capabilities.name: list_llm_txt
capabilities.description: List available LLM.txt files from the directory. Use this first before fetching a specific LLM.txt file. Format your response in beautiful markdown.

capabilities.name: search_llm_txt
capabilities.description: Search for multiple substrings in an LLM.txt file. Requires a valid ID obtained from list_llm_txt command. Returns snippets with page numbers for each match. Format your response in beautiful markdown, using code blocks for snippets.
